name: Dungeon crawler (itch) (Dumb_Games)
description:
A game for The Linux Jam 2022

You were sent in a dungeon to rescue a knight. (Best background for a character, i know)

Music : https://opengameart.org/content/the-organ-nes-version by Snabisch

Assets : https://blueapollo.itch.io/oracle-1bit-assets by blueapollo
